intro.title: AI HUNMINJEONGEUM South Korea, the world's best use of artificial intelligence

description.m: Just as King Sejong the Great created 28 letters for the people who could not express themselves properly due to lack of writing, this casebook combines 7 types of data handled by A.I. and 4 types of tasks performed by A.I. into an integrated platform.
description.d:
Just as King Sejong the Great created 28 letters for the people who could not express
 themselves properly due to lack of writing, this casebook combines 7 types of data
 handled by A.I. and 4 types of tasks performed by A.I. into an integrated platform.

description.m:
There are seven types of data that AI deals with:
 text, image, voice, video, satellite, log/numeric, and binary
description.d:
There are seven types of data that AI deals with:
 text, image, voice, video, satellite, log/numeric, and binary.

description.m: There are four tasks that AI performs: classification, regression, clustering, and anomaly detection.
description.d:
There are four tasks that AI performs:
 classification, regression, clustering, and anomaly detection.

description.m: It is a framework mounted on the T3Q.ai platform with contents such as data, models, methods, guides, and practice videos for 28 cases that combine 7 types of data and 4 types of tasks covered by AI.
description.d:
It is a framework mounted on the T3Q.ai platform with contents such as data, models, methods, guides,
 and practice videos for 28 cases that combine 7 types of data and 4 types of tasks covered by AI.

image.alt: Image of the table of 28 best practices for HUNMINJEONGEUM

description.m: Applying AI HUNMINJEONGEUM to services makes it easier to learn AI and discover services. It's also easy to develop services.
description.d:
Applying AI HUNMINJEONGEUM to services makes it easier to learn AI
 and discover services. It's also easy to develop services.

description.m: The AI Hun Min Ching platform can be utilized for a variety of purposes including schools, military, government, enterprise, healthcare, and more.
description.d:
The AI Hun Min Ching platform can be utilized for a variety of purposes including schools,
 military, government, enterprise, healthcare, and more.

uses.title: Nationals AI
uses.description: Let's make it easy for anyone to learn and implement their ideas with AI!
